item.description:
This class will be the BEST mediation class you will ever take! There will be a review of basics with breathing and posture, but it will go much deeper than the average meditation class. It will be a series of partially guided meditations and visualizing exercises throughout the day. During each meditation, your breathe will open your heart. The opened heart will reveal the connection to your spirit and your soul. Meditations will explore these connections and bring you closer to your own divinity within. The results will be a heightened sense of peacefulness and well being. Stress will dissolve... Your mind will be more at ease... Your body will feel more relaxed... and you will have tools for long lasting results in your future efforts to meditate. Some people have experienced deep emotional healing as well as physically feeling better than they have in years.
The program will include a vegetarian lunch, break time snacks, and ionized water through the day. Feel free to bring your own yoga mats or meditating pillow.Â Cost is $99.00

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: "Beyond Meditation" All Day Course
